question:
Nowadays the way many people interact with each other has changed because of technology.
In what ways has technology affected the types of relationships that people make? Has this been a positive or negative development?
text: The advancement in technology has altered the way people connect to each other over the past years. This essay will discuss how people form bonds with other people around the world through telecommunication. This essay will also state the benefits that people acquired for this development.

The power of communication technology has become the smartest and easiest way to reach anyone to every corner of the globe. It enabled people to connect easier, faster, and more convenient. Moreover, it made it possible for everyone to stay connected with their friends, relatives and for businesses as well regardless of their location with the help of social media applications. For example, the invention of an application called Skype wherein it has features like video calling and exchanging of messages and photos that allows people to socialize and get updates to anyone they wanted to.

This technological development has been considered a tremendous impact on the history of human kind which provided numerous benefits. Firstly, with the current technology, one of its main advantages is that people are able to reach out with other people in a matter of seconds. It made the world closer, making communication across long distance easier. Secondly, nowadays, people can now work whenever they are as long as they are logged into the internet. This is very handy, especially to businesses that have clients overseas whereas they can make live meetings and discussions through online networks like LinkedIn.

In conclusion, communication technology is extensively being used by everyone and it transformed how people network with each other. This advancement in technology in the mode of communication paved way to the development of fast communication and I firmly believe that this has been a positive development as it aid in eliminating communication barriers.
